name: .MSI File Extension
summary: Learn about .MSI files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: In Windows, you can open an MSI file by double-clicking it. Doing so will allow you to install the Windows updates or program your MSI file contains.
Because MSI files are compressed archives, you can also decompress them to examine the files they contain. For example, you can use 7-Zip to decompress an MSI file and examine its contents.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
